attributes.action: Void the Premier League season due to VAR & Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Void the season, start again next year with 24 teams in the league.
attributes.background:
VAR has ruined the premier league and isnt fit for purpose, Now, coronavirus has the potential to delay the league for a while.

 It would be careless to end the season without all teams playing all their games, so to void the season is the only solution.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
